title: The role of DDIT3 in modulating proliferation and tamoxifen resistance in luminal A subtype breast cancer through the DDIT3-IRF1 axis.
abstract: This study investigates the role of DNA Damage Inducible Transcript 3 (DDIT3) in luminal A subtype breast cancer (LABC). DDIT3, a transcription factor linked to various stress responses, has been implicated in tumorigenesis, yet its specific contributions to LABC biology remain poorly understood.
